mapper.select: select id,title,view_cnt,updated_date,user_id,comment_cnt from boards order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into boards (id, title, content, created_date, updated_date, user_id) values (null,#{title},#{content},now(),now(),#{user_id})
mapper.delete: delete from boards where id = #{id} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update boards set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_date = now() where id = #{id} and user_id = #{user_id}
update boards set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where id = #{id}
update boards set comment_cnt = 1 + #{comment_cnt} where id = #{id}

choose.otherwise: and (title like concat ('%',#{keyword}, '%') or content like concat ('%',#{keyword}, '%'))
